txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: The Eglain desire proof that spiders making their home within and beneath ruins in the Lone-lands are destroyed. Deliver large filth to me, Gadaric Munce, at The Forsaken Inn, and you will earn our favour.
'My people have long suffered and feared the fangs of the spiders in these lands. This will do well to give us some solace and you favour.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Spiders are covered in filth and can be found beneath the ruins in the western Lone-lands and scattered across the central Lone-lands.'
Gadaric Munce of the Eglain offers favour with his people in exchange for the large filth collected from spiders in the western Lone-lands.
Deliver the large filth to Gadaric Munce at The Forsaken Inn
You accepted a task to acquire large filth for Gadaric Munce. Spiders beneath the ruins in the western Lone-lands likely teem with the filth. You can find Gadaric within The Forsaken Inn.
Wanted: The Eglain desire proof that spiders making their home within and beneath ruins in the Lone-lands are destroyed.
